<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pilferer's Gloves](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2141)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 15,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn gloves

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Made of soft and subtle black leather, these gloves fit tightly but aren't uncomfortable and don't impede your sense of touch. As long as you're trained in [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) while wearing these gloves, you're always considered one skill rank higher than your actual rank. If you possess a Legendary skill rank in Thievery, you gain a +2 item bonus to Thievery checks instead. When you invest the gloves, you either increase your Dexterity modifier by 1 or increase it to +4, whichever is higher.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You fail or critically fail a Thievery skill check;  **Effect** If you failed the Thievery skill check, you succeed at that check instead. If you critically failed, you fail instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Pilferer's Gloves
